alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:50PM AKST until December 12 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...A strong warm front will produce impactful snow over the northeast Gulf Coast and portions of the northern Panhandle from tonight through Monday night. Low level warm air will move in behind this front and this will result in a transition from snow to rain or a rain/snow mix from Monday afternoon through Monday night... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gustavus, Elfin Cove, and Pelican. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow will be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will transition to rain and become moderate to heavy at times, complicating snow removal efforts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Glacier Bay
